result.eng: Did she have a long life?
result.ga: An raibh saol fada aici
result.orig: An raibh saol fada aici
result.html: An raibh saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?

result.eng: Anyway, to make a long story short...
result.ga: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.orig: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.html: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...
result.ponchtml: Cibé ar biṫ le scéal fada a ḋéanaṁ gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...

result.eng: How long is it?
result.ga: Cé chomh fada is atá sé
result.orig: Cé chomh fada is atá sé
result.html: Cé chomh fada is atá séHow long is it?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ fada is atá séHow long is it?

result.eng: Why did you stay so long?
result.ga: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.orig: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.html: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sinWhy did you stay so long?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ ar ḟan tú ċoṁ fada sinWhy did you stay so long?

result.eng: My husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ga: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.orig: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.html: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Is fada m'ḟear céile imiṫe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.

result.eng: I like long walks in nature.
result.ga: Is maith liom siúlóidí fada sa dúlra
result.orig: Is maith liom siúlóidí fada sa dúlra
result.html: Is maith liom siúlóidí fada sa dúlraI like long walks in nature.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom siúlóidí fada sa dúlraI like long walks in nature.

result.eng: It hasn't snowed for a long time.
result.ga: Ní raibh sé ag cur sneachta le fada
result.orig: Ní raibh sé ag cur sneachta le fada
result.html: Ní raibh sé ag cur sneachta le fadaIt hasn't snowed for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sé ag cur sneaċta le fadaIt hasn't snowed for a long time.

result.eng: The book has long been out of print.
result.ga: Tá an leabhar as cló le fada
result.orig: Tá an leabhar as cló le fada
result.html: Tá an leabhar as cló le fadaThe book has long been out of print.
result.ponchtml: Tá an leaḃar as cló le fadaThe book has long been out of print.

result.eng: The house has been for sale for a long time.
result.ga: Tá an teach ar díol le fada
result.orig: Tá an teach ar díol le fada
result.html: Tá an teach ar díol le fadaThe house has been for sale for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ ar díol le fadaThe house has been for sale for a long time.

result.eng: That has been a problem for a long time.
result.ga: Tá sé sin ina fhadhb le fada an lá
result.orig: Tá sé sin ina fhadhb le fada an lá
result.html: Tá sé sin ina fhadhb le fada an láThat has been a problem for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin ina ḟaḋb le fada an láThat has been a problem for a long time.

result.eng: He has been dead for a long time.
result.ga: Tá sé marbh le fada
result.orig: Tá sé marbh le fada
result.html: Tá sé marbh le fadaHe has been dead for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé marḃ le fadaHe has been dead for a long time.

result.eng: I live a long way away, on the edge of the city.
result.ga: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrach
result.orig: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrach
result.html: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrachI live a long way away, on the edge of the city.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise i mo ċónaí tamall fada amaċ ar imeall na caṫraċI live a long way away, on the edge of the city.

result.eng: She's been in Chicago for years and years.
result.ga: In Chicago atá sí leis na blianta fada
result.orig: In Chicago atá sí leis na blianta fada
result.html: In Chicago atá sí leis na blianta fadaShe's been in Chicago for years and years.
result.ponchtml: In Ċicago atá sí leis na blianta fadaShe's been in Chicago for years and years.

result.eng: I usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Téim ar ẛiúlóidí fada de ġnáṫ ag an deireaḋ seaċtaine is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.

result.eng: Máire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ga: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.orig: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.html: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ponchtml: Luiġ Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular ṫit néal ar biṫ codlata uirṫiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ga: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.orig: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.html: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ mo ċéad ċuairt ar Ṁeiriceá i gcuiṁne dom blianta fada ó ẛinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ga: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
result.orig: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
result.html: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fadaHe was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Éireannaċ ab ea é a ḃí ina ċónaí i Meiriceá le fadaHe was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.

result.eng: We've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
result.ga: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home Rule
result.orig: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home Rule
result.html: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home RuleWe've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
result.ponchtml: Is fada sinn ag feiṫeaṁ léi mar Home RuleWe've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.

result.eng: Where was he all that time?
result.ga: Cá raibh sé le fada riamh
result.orig: Cá raibh sé le fada riamh
result.html: Cá raibh sé le fada riamhWhere was he all that time?
result.ponchtml: Cá raiḃ sé le fada riaṁWhere was he all that time?
